question: When is ‘International Day Against Drug Abuse and Illicit Trafficking’ observed?
explanation:
The International Day Against Drug Abuse and Illicit Trafficking is observed annually on June 26. This year, theme of the day is ‘Better Knowledge for Better Care’.
Also known as ‘World Drug Day’, it was designated by the United Nations General Assembly (UNGA) in December 1987. The UN with the aid of its anti-drug abuse arm, United Nations Office on Drugs and Crime (UNODC) spreads awareness on the impact of illicit drugs in our society.
